SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Research Investment Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Research Investment Rate is Further Education Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Research Investment Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Research Investment Rate is Discipline Coverage Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Discipline Coverage Rate, is the point for East Jamesstad College inside or outside the point for Robinside Institute?
SRP.A: On the Discipline Coverage Rate, the point for East Jamesstad College is outside the point for Robinside Institute.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Further Education Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Robinside Institute?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Further Education Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Discipline Coverage Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Citation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Citation Rate, label {Robinside Institute} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Further Education Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Further Education Rate, label {East Jamesstad College} scores the lowest.

NC.Q: For Robinside Institute, which dimension has a higher score: Research Investment Rate or Discipline Coverage Rate?
NC.A: {Research Investment Rate} has a higher score than Discipline Coverage Rate for Robinside Institute.

NC.Q: On Further Education Rate, which label has a higher score: East Jamesstad College or the Robinside Institute?

MSR.Q: For East Jamesstad College, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: East Jamesstad College most needs to improve its {Further Education Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {East Jamesstad College}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
